class.name: SiONEvent
class.brief_description: Generic container for event data for GDSiON events.

method.name: get_data
method.description: Returns a reference to the [SiONData] instance involved in the event.

method.name: get_driver
method.description: Returns a reference to the [SiONDriver] instance.

method.name: get_event_type
method.description: Returns the type of the event, as a string.

method.name: get_stream_buffer
method.description: Returns a stream buffer involved in the event. The buffer is always provided in stereo, with the [code]x[/code] aspect representing the left channel, and the [code]y[/code] aspect representing the right channel.
